title: All You Had To Do Was Stay (Taylor's Version)
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:01.73] (Hey, hey, hey)
[00:04.14] (Hey, hey, hey)
[00:05.80] (Hey, hey, hey)
[00:08.38] (Hey, hey, hey)
[00:10.64] People like you always want back
[00:13.59] The love they gave away
[00:15.43] And people like me wanna believe you
[00:18.48] When you say you've changed
[00:20.32] The more I think about it now
[00:23.36] The less I know
[00:25.55] All I know is that you drove us
[00:28.66] Off the road
[00:29.62] (Stay) hey, all you had to do was stay
[00:33.55] Had me in the palm of your hand, then
[00:36.03] Why'd you have to go and lock me out when I let you in?
[00:39.62] (Stay) hey, now you say you want it back
[00:43.44] Now that it's just too late, well, could've been easy
[00:47.70] All you had to do was (stay)
[00:50.20] All you had to do was (stay)
[00:52.61] All you had to do was (stay)
[00:55.02] All you had to do was (stay)
[00:57.53] All you had to do was (stay)
[01:00.19] Here you are now, calling me up
[01:02.88] But I don't know what to say
[01:05.07] I've been pickin' up the pieces
[01:07.85] Of the mess you made
[01:09.90] People like you always want back
[01:13.03] The love they pushed aside
[01:14.74] But people like me are gone forever
[01:17.76] When you say goodbye
[01:19.30] (Stay) hey, all you had to do was stay
[01:23.18] Had me in the palm of your hand, then
[01:25.60] Why'd you have to go and lock me out when I let you in?
[01:29.29] (Stay) hey, now you say you want it back
[01:33.06] Now that it's just too late, well, could've been easy
[01:37.34] All you had to do was (stay)
[01:39.79] All you had to do was (stay)
[01:42.29] All you had to do was (stay)
[01:44.73] All you had to do was (stay, stay, stay, stay)
[01:47.80] Let me remind you
[01:48.96] This was what you wanted (oh, oh, oh-oh-oh)
[01:57.39] You ended it
[01:58.87] You were all I wanted (oh, oh, oh-oh-oh)
[02:07.59] But not like this
[02:10.44] Not like this, not like this
[02:16.80] Oh, all you had to do was
[02:18.71] (Stay) hey, all you had to do was stay
[02:22.49] Had me in the palm of your hand, then
[02:24.81] Why'd you have to go and lock me out when I let you in?
[02:28.63] (Stay) hey, now you say you want it back
[02:32.30] Now that it's just too late, well, could've been easy
[02:36.73] All you had to do was (stay)
[02:39.25] Hey, all you had to do was stay
[02:42.10] Had me in the palm of your hand, then
[02:44.62] Why'd you have to go and lock me out when I let you in?
[02:48.52] (Stay) hey, now you say you want it back
[02:52.05] Now that it's just too late, well, it could've been easy (all you had to do was stay)
[02:56.22] All you had to do was (stay)
[02:58.86] All you had to do was (stay, oh)
[03:01.20] All you had to do was (stay)
[03:03.79] All you had to do was (stay, ooh)
[03:06.15] All you had to do was (stay)
